channel.title: Help with runing server
channel.description: ok i want to start my server but it says java is not recognized as a internal external command here look at run @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

item.title: Help with runing server
item.dc:creator: @glad_2_own glad 2 own
item.description:
@glad_2_own wrote:

sorry it wasent compialer it was run
@echo off
title Dragonic-Scape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic

item.title: Help with runing server
item.dc:creator: @sebblol sebblol
item.description:
@sebblol wrote:

[quote=“glad 2 own, post:1, topic:417040”]@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause[/quote]
Change the “c:\program files (x86)\java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe”
to you version of java
or you can try to remove the “c:\program files (x86)\java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe”
and just put java
so it would be

@echo off Title Compiler javac.exe *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Help with runing server
item.dc:creator: @glad_2_own glad 2 own
item.description:
@glad_2_own wrote:

ok i want to start my server but it says java is not recognized as a internal external command here look at run
@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause
